mapper.select: SELECT files.id, file_name, modifiable_name, file_path, picture.id as picture_id, love, `display`, author, width, height, mp, file_size, cover, create_time FROM files INNER JOIN picture ON files.id = picture.files_id WHERE type = 3 AND deleted = 1 AND `display` = 1 AND files.id >= ( SELECT floor( RAND() * ( SELECT MAX( id ) FROM files ) ) ) AND is_folder = 2 ORDER BY files.id LIMIT #{limit}
